result:
Perfect! I've successfully updated the ThemeToggle component to use semantic color tokens instead of hardcoded gray colors.

**Steps taken:**
1. Read ThemeToggle component file
2. Replaced hardcoded gray classes with semantic tokens
3. Updated button styling to use design system colors

The component now uses `text-muted-foreground`, `hover:text-foreground`, and `hover:bg-accent` which will automatically adapt to the cream/off-white and red/orange color scheme through your design system tokens.
